messages.content: You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

Ni3N is Upper Bainite structured and crystallizes in the hexagonal P6_322 space group. Ni(1) is bonded in a bent 120 degrees geometry to two equivalent N(1) atoms. Both Ni(1)-N(1) bond lengths are 1.87 Å. N(1) is bonded to six equivalent Ni(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NNi6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedral tilt angles are 50°. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.014724856562498001 eV/atom.
You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

Ni4N crystallizes in the cubic Pm-3m space group. There are two inequivalent Ni sites. In the first Ni site, Ni(1) is bonded to twelve equivalent Ni(2) atoms to form NiNi12 cuboctahedra that share corners with twelve equivalent Ni(1)Ni12 cuboctahedra, faces with six equivalent Ni(1)Ni12 cuboctahedra, and faces with eight equivalent N(1)Ni6 octahedra. All Ni(1)-Ni(2) bond lengths are 2.63 Å. In the second Ni site, Ni(2) is bonded in a linear geometry to four equivalent Ni(1) and two equivalent N(1) atoms. Both Ni(2)-N(1) bond lengths are 1.86 Å. N(1) is bonded to six equivalent Ni(2) atoms to form NNi6 octahedra that share corners with six equivalent N(1)Ni6 octahedra and faces with eight equivalent Ni(1)Ni12 cuboctahedra. The corner-sharing octahedra are not tilted. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.06668797600000001 eV/atom.
You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

Ni4N crystallizes in the cubic Pm-3m space group. The structure consists of one ammonia atom inside a Ni framework. In the Ni framework, there are two inequivalent Ni sites. In the first Ni site, Ni(1) is bonded in a linear geometry to two equivalent Ni(2) atoms. Both Ni(1)-Ni(2) bond lengths are 2.11 Å. In the second Ni site, Ni(2) is bonded to six equivalent Ni(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NiNi6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedra are not tilted. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 2.018677975999999 eV/atom.
You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

Ni4N3 crystallizes in the cubic Pm-3m space group. There are two inequivalent Ni sites. In the first Ni site, Ni(1) is bonded in a square co-planar geometry to four equivalent N(1) atoms. All Ni(1)-N(1) bond lengths are 1.98 Å. In the second Ni site, Ni(2) is bonded to six equivalent N(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NiN6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedra are not tilted. All Ni(2)-N(1) bond lengths are 1.98 Å. N(1) is bonded to two equivalent Ni(2) and four equivalent Ni(1) atoms to form a mixture of edge and corner-sharing NNi6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedra are not tilted. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.294470164047621 eV/atom.
You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

NiN is Tetraauricupride structured and crystallizes in the cubic Pm-3m space group. Ni(1) is bonded in a body-centered cubic geometry to eight equivalent N(1) atoms. All Ni(1)-N(1) bond lengths are 2.20 Å. N(1) is bonded in a body-centered cubic geometry to eight equivalent Ni(1) atoms. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.9701725316666661 eV/atom.
You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

NiN is Halite, Rock Salt structured and crystallizes in the cubic Fm-3m space group. Ni(1) is bonded to six equivalent N(1) atoms to form a mixture of edge and corner-sharing NiN6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedra are not tilted. All Ni(1)-N(1) bond lengths are 2.03 Å. N(1) is bonded to six equivalent Ni(1) atoms to form a mixture of edge and corner-sharing NNi6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedra are not tilted. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.472471271666666 eV/atom.
You are an expert in performance prediction for nitride materials.

NiN is Zincblende, Sphalerite structured and crystallizes in the cubic F-43m space group. Ni(1) is bonded to four equivalent N(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NiN4 tetrahedra. All Ni(1)-N(1) bond lengths are 1.87 Å. N(1) is bonded to four equivalent Ni(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NNi4 tetrahedra. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.292849061666666 eV/atom.

NiN crystallizes in the tetragonal P4_2/mmc space group. The structure is one-dimensional and consists of two NiN ribbons oriented in the (1, 0, 0) direction. Ni(1) is bonded in a linear geometry to two equivalent N(1) atoms. Both Ni(1)-N(1) bond lengths are 1.68 Å. N(1) is bonded in a linear geometry to two equivalent Ni(1) atoms. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.875643596666666 eV/atom.

NiN is Wurtzite structured and crystallizes in the hexagonal P6_3mc space group. Ni(1) is bonded to four equivalent N(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NiN4 tetrahedra. There are three shorter (1.87 Å) and one longer (1.88 Å) Ni(1)-N(1) bond length. N(1) is bonded to four equivalent Ni(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NNi4 tetrahedra. What is the Band Gap and Predicted Formation Energy of this nitride material?
Band Gap : 0.0 eV; Predicted Formation Energy : 0.31252968416666604 eV/atom.
